title: SFEC Form 114.5 - Behested Contributions Received by Certain Committees - Filings
description: Under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 1.114.5(b)(2), any ballot measure committee or committee making independent expenditures that receives contributions totaling $5,000 or more in a calendar year at the behest of a City elective officer shall file Form 114.5. “At the behest of” means under the control or at the direction of, in cooperation, consultation, coordination, or concert with, at the request or suggestion of, or with the express, prior consent of. However, a contribution is not made at the behest of a public official solely because the official requested the contribution via television, radio, billboard, a public message on an online platform, the distribution of 200 or more identical pieces of printed material, the distribution of a single email to 200 or more recipients, or a speech to a group of 20 or more individuals. The committee must file Form 114.5 no later than the deadline to file the semi-annual or pre-election campaign statement that must report the contribution that makes the cumulative total $5,000 or more. For more information visit www.sfethics.org. Each row on this table represents the contents of a Form 114.5 filed with the Ethics Commission. There is one sub-tables of information on Form 114.5: Itemized Contributions. The sub-table is available in a separate dataset: "SFEC Form 114.5 - Behested Contributions Received by Certain Committees - Contributions" at https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/SFEC-Form-114-5-Behested-Contributions-Received-by/mq45-f9zi. Join this dataset with the sub-table using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: Contributor Subtable Query URL
columns.description: URL to query contributors reported on filing.  Response is in JSON format.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing URL
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Reason for amendment description

columns.name: Start Date
columns.description: Start Date of Statement - In relation to campaign statement period that will reflect final payment

columns.name: End Date
columns.description: End Date of Statement - In relation to campaign statement period that will reflect final payment

columns.name: FPPC ID
columns.description: Committee FPPC ID number

columns.name: Committee Name
columns.description: Committee is Filer of this form and recipient of behested contribution

columns.name: Designated Contact Person
columns.description: Name of committee’s designated contact person

columns.name: Contact Person Telephone
columns.description: Phone number of committee’s designated contact person

columns.name: Contact Person Email
columns.description: Email address of committee’s designated contact person.  (Field is optional)

columns.name: City Elective Officer
columns.description: Name of City elective officer who behested contribution(s)

columns.name: City Elective Officer Title
columns.description: Title of City elective officer who behested contribution(s)

columns.name: Total Amount of Contribution(s) Received at the Behest of the Elective Officer
columns.description: Total cumulative amount of contributions received at the behest of the City elective officer

columns.name: Date Contribution(s) Received Equaled or Exceeded 5,000
columns.description: Date of final payment from business entity that made the cumulative total $5,000 or more

columns.name: Additional Itemized Contributions Checkbox
columns.description: Indicates that a supplemental filing is required for this filing

columns.name: DateSigned
columns.description: Date form signed and filed by filer

columns.name: Signer Name
columns.description: Name of person who signed the form.

whom_it_may_interest: Economic researchers, campaign finance analysts, policymakers, journalists

queries.Monthly: SELECT cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename, date_trunc_ym(startdate) AS month, SUM(contributiontotal) AS total_contributions WHERE startdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename, month ORDER BY month, cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename
queries.Yearly: SELECT cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename, date_trunc_y(startdate) AS year, SUM(contributiontotal) AS total_contributions WHERE startdate >= '2022-09-01' GROUP BY cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename, year ORDER BY year, cityelectiveofficertitle, cityelectiveofficername, committeename
